attributes.action: DRIVERS CONVICTED OF ROAD RAGE OFFENCES SHOULD BE BANNED FOR LIFE FROM EVER DRIVING & OWNING A CAR AGAIN.
attributes.additional_details: THAT ANY UK DRIVING LICENCE HOLDER CONVICTED OF A ROAD RAGE OFFENCE SHOULD BE SUBJECT TO A LIFETIME BAN FROM BOTH DRIVING & OWNING A CAR OR A MOTORBIKE.SUCH PEOPLE WHO ARE CONVICTED OF ROAD RAGE OFFENCES DO NOT HAVE THE CORRECT TEMPERMENT FOR BEING A RESPONSIBLE PERSON IN CHARGE OF A MOTOR VEHICLE ON THE QUEENS HIGHWAY
